description:
The panic at Glastonbury over illegal entrants and "over-crowding" exposes the middle-class Left's hypocrisy on immigration, says Michael Deacon. It seems when it comes to a music festival, borders matter.

The post The Glastonbury Panic Over Illegal Entrants Exposes the Middle-Class Left’s Hypocrisy on Immigration appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Glastonbury Panic Over Illegal Entrants Exposes the Middle-Class Left’s Hypocrisy on Immigration

description:
The 2024 General Election is probably the first time that we have seen an Islamic agenda openly influencing an election in the U.K., says Tim Dieppe. What are the ramifications for British democracy?

The post The Growing Power of the ‘Muslim Vote’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Growing Power of the ‘Muslim Vote’

description:
We should vote Conservative to keep out the Trots and their permanent revolution, says Peter Hitchens. No no no, that just ratifies the Uniparty, says Matt Goodwin. Professor James Alexander ponders the dilemma.

The post To Vote Conservative or Not to Vote Conservative? Reflections on Matt Goodwin vs Peter Hitchens appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: To Vote Conservative or Not to Vote Conservative? Reflections on Matt Goodwin vs Peter Hitchens

description:
Chilly 'Junuary' in fact had more sunshine than average for the time of year, the Met Office has claimed – using its 19th century sunshine recorders that can't tell when its cloudy.

The post ‘Junuary’ Was Actually Very Sunny, Says Met Office appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Junuary’ Was Actually Very Sunny, Says Met Office

description:
Left-wing academics view the ‘far right’ the same way early European explorers viewed the native people they encountered – as primitive, dangerous and in need of ‘civilising’.

The post Why Are ‘Far Right’ Parties on the Rise in Europe? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Are ‘Far Right’ Parties on the Rise in Europe?

description:
When Dr Marion Gruber left the FDA in 2021, the narrative was that she quit because she was unhappy about the Covid vaccine. In fact, she signed the letter granting Pfizer/BioNTech full approval, says Robert Kogon.

The post The Myth of the FDA ‘Covid Vaccine Critic’ Marion Gruber appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Myth of the FDA ‘Covid Vaccine Critic’ Marion Gruber

description:
A teacher has written a hair-raising account In the Daily Sceptic of how schoolchildren are being spoon fed hard Left ideology under the guise of teaching them to be more 'inclusive'.

The post Schoolchildren Are Being Indoctrinated With Hard Left Ideology Under the Guise of Teaching Them to be ‘Inclusive’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Schoolchildren Are Being Indoctrinated With Hard Left Ideology Under the Guise of Teaching Them to be ‘Inclusive’
